entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow late this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
